titleStmt.title: Sample H08 from Rhode Island Governor's Proclamations:

R. I. Heritage Week, April 29-May 7, 1961 Armed Forces Day, May 20, 1961 National Maritime Day, May 22, 1961 Miss R. I. Pageant Week, June 11-17, 1961 United Nations Day, October 24, 1961 The State Ballet of R. I. Week,November 13, 1961 ff. Thanksgiving Day, November 23, 1961
